word_mean: 〔USP〕麻黄碱，麻黄素：肾上腺素能药，化学名〔R-(R，S〕-α-〔1－(甲基氢基)乙基〕苯甲醇，C10H15NO，从麻黄属植物中获得或人工合成，为油样几乎无色的固体或白色结晶或颗粒。以其盐酸盐或硫酸盐入药，主要用于过敏状态时减轻鼻粘膜充血，支气管哮喘时扩张小支气管，发作性睡病与中枢神经系统抑制药中毒时兴奋中枢神经系统，防止脊髓和浸润麻醉时的血压下降，还可用作扩瞳药

sentence.Network_en: From 1992 to 1998, the relevant government departments issued several regulations on the control of ephedrine.
sentence.Network_cn: 1992年至1998年, 中国有关部门多次发布关于麻黄素管理方面的规定.

sentence.Network_en: The content of ephedrine hydrochloride was determined by HPLC.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用高效液相色谱方法测定盐酸麻黄碱的含量.

sentence.Network_en: Departments of public health must enhance control over prescribed ephedrine preparations.
sentence.Network_cn: 卫生部门要加强对麻黄素单方制剂的管理.

means.word_mean: 1. white odorless powdered or crystalline alkaloid from plants of the genus Ephedra (especially Ephedra sinica) or made synthetically; used as a bronchodilator to treat bronchitis and asthma
